short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clicks the button when crafting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crafting Companion automates the crafting process by automatically clicking the designated button. Whether you're busy with other tasks or simply want to streamline your crafting experience, this extension ensures that your crafting tasks are completed efficiently. With Crafting Companion, you can focus on more important aspects of your workflow while the extension handles the repetitive clicking for you. Simplify your crafting process and boost your productivity with Crafting Companion today.

PS: refresh the pixels page before clicking start.
